title: Google\Cloud\Billing\Budgets\V1beta1\BudgetAmount
name: BudgetAmount
description:
The budgeted amount for each usage period.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.billing.budgets.v1beta1.BudgetAmount

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.specified_amount
params.description: A specified amount to use as the budget. currency_code is optional. If specified when creating a budget, it must match the currency of the billing account. If specified when updating a budget, it must match the currency_code of the existing budget. The currency_code is provided on output.

params.name: data.last_period_amount
params.description: Use the last period's actual spend as the budget for the present period. LastPeriodAmount can only be set when the budget's time period is a [Filter.calendar_period][google.cloud.billing.budgets.v1beta1.Filter.calendar_period]. It cannot be set in combination with [Filter.custom_period][google.cloud.billing.budgets.v1beta1.Filter.custom_period].

methods.name: getSpecifiedAmount
methods.description:
A specified amount to use as the budget.

currency_code is optional. If specified when creating a budget, it must match the currency of the billing account. If specified when updating a budget, it must match the currency_code of the existing budget. The currency_code is provided on output.
